text: An election to Mayo County Council took place on 27 June 1991 as part of that year's Irish local elections. 31 councillors were elected from seven electoral divisions by PR-STV voting for a five-year term of office. ==Results by party== {| class=wikitable ! colspan=2 align=center|Party ! valign=top|Seats ! valign=top|± ! valign=top|First Pref. votes ! valign=top|FPv% ! valign=top|±% |- | align=right|15 | align=right|- | align=right|25,672 | align=right|47.29% | align=right| |- | align=right|13 | align=right|-1 | align=right|21,656 | align=right|39.89% | align=right| |- | align=right|1 | align=right|+1 | align=right|1,949 | align=right|3.59% | align=right| |- | align=right|2 | align=right|- | align=right|3,484 | align=right|6.42% | align=right| |- | align=right|0 | align=right|- | align=right|860 | align=right|0.59% | align=right| |- | align=right|0 | align=right|- | align=right|336 | align=right|0.59% | align=right| |- | colspan=2 align=center|Totals | align=right |31 | align=center|- | align=right |54,292 | align=center|100% | align=center|— |} ==Results by Electoral Area== ===Ballina=== ===Castlebar=== ===Claremorris=== ===Killala=== ===Swinford=== ===Westport=== ==External links== * Official website Category:1991 Irish local elections 1991
title: 1991 Mayo County Council election
